description:
Sync or back up your folders on your Windows PC or Mac for easy access anytime, anywhere


Fixed issues
- Fixed an issue where BeeStation for desktop might fail to remotely connect to BeeStation under certain network environments.
- Fixed an issue where pausing/continuing sync or backups via BeeStation for desktop menu from the Windows system tray or macOS menu bar caused the status to display incorrectly.
- Fixed an issue where photo transfers might fail during the transfer process if certain files could not generate previews.
ï¼·indows
- Fixed an issue where BeeStation for desktop could not be used if the computer account name contained special characters.
macOS
- Fixed an issue where uploading a large number of HEIC photos via BeeStation for desktop on macOS 15 might result in blank thumbnails in BeePhotos or BeeFiles.
